# HUD::DISABLE_PAUSEMENU_SPINNER

## Parameters
* **BOOL** disable: Disable/enable it.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Disable the pause menu spinner.  Re-enable after done, please.
